Plot: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.
Title: Bullet to the Head
Writer: Alessandro Camon (screenplay), Alexis Nolent (based on the graphic novel "Du plomb dans la tête" by), Colin Wilson (based on the graphic novel "Du plomb dans la tête" illustrated by)
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, Sung Kang, Sarah Shahi, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje
tomatoConsensus: Bullet to the Head's unapologetically trashy thrills evoke memories of its star and director's proud cinematic pasts -- but sadly, those memories are just about all it has to offer.
